data.name: Gem Worlds Demo
data.detailed_description:
The demo includes a full slice of the game:

  • All of the core gameplay: get gems, fight monsters, use skills
  • One out of five worlds
  • Five out of ten skills

It's a great way to try out the game and see if you want more of the same.
data.about_the_game:
The demo includes a full slice of the game:

  • All of the core gameplay: get gems, fight monsters, use skills
  • One out of five worlds
  • Five out of ten skills

It's a great way to try out the game and see if you want more of the same.
data.short_description: Gem World is a roguelike-puzzle hybrid. Explore 50levels in 5 unique worlds. Dodge boulders, collect gems, fight (or avoid) monsters. Unlock and upgrade more than 10 diverse skills across multiple runs. Exploit obstacles like mines, teleporters, and more. Turn-based and easy to play.
